about_the_game:
Welcome to post-Ragnarok! The World Tree has been shattered, but your clan is trying to piece it back together by building settlements on shards of Yggdrasil. Experience roguelike citybuilding with this demo that starts you directly into the action! Go on expeditions, gather some loot and upgrade your Holt to gain access to new buildings, scions and ways to play!

This demo skips a lot of the story because we're interested in having your feedback about the game loop! Please tell us your feedback :)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 8.1 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 or Intel equivalent.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7750, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
